meta.job_title: Thermal and Combustion Process Senior Technician

duties_responsibilities.duty: Corporate expert on Combustion Safety for Arconic, Thermal Best Practice development and deployment, and problem-solving with a global systemic and plant-specific focus.
Drive process efficiencies through lowering costs, improving quality, training operators and technologists, and implementing new technologies.
Provide engineering and operational support for large capital improvement projects and technical assessments of facilities and equipment.
Participate in technical assessments of facilities and individual pieces of equipment, and provide equipment, control, and process training to the technical base.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or GED with 15 years of manufacturing experience, with a minimum of 7 years in Thermal and Combustion Safety. Bachelor’s degree in Electrical or Mechanical Engineering or related field (preferred)
